title: Malzahar needs a second rework or revert....opinion poll
body: Since Ryze is getting his dozenth rework I thought It might be a good time to try to get Malz a little attention. Malzahar was my favorite champion up until his rework where they changed him from an assassin counter pick mid to an objective focused jungler and I miss him.  So riot, next year when your reworking Ryze again...Remember Malzahar has only had 1 and still isn't played.

replies.body: He needs a full on relaunch. His kit doesn't leave much room for balance, especially his ult.
I wouldn't mind him being reworked into a proper summoner, while still maintaining his identity...but thats just wishful thinking i guess
